description:
Get the app that is endorsed by the Mayor of New York City!

As Featured on
CNN, NY Times, Fox News, Wall St Journal, Village Voice, ABC News, Bloomberg, SF Chronicle and more!

Winner of 3 Awards at the NYC Big Apps Competition!


In the Press
------------
"Top 5 Travel Apps for 2010 - Best one-stop shop: NYC Way. Free iPhone app" 
- Fox News

"An iPhone application called NYC Way that offers a range of information for city residents and visitors, took home the “Popular Choice” award, determined by an online vote"
- NY Times

"NYC Way, an iPhone application that bundles a variety of NYC resources for tourists and locals (also the Investor's Choice for monetization potential and Popular Choice winner)."
- ReadWriteWeb

"NYC Way iPhone App (www.nycway.com) gives you all you need in NYC."
- Yahoo News

"If you are in a “New York state of mind” this will work out wonderfully for you." 
- Killer Startups

"Get the application that does it all for FREE, and find your WAY with NYC Way"
- Daily Cup of Apps

What People are Saying:
---------------------

"I've been a "NYer" for 20 years now; thought I've seen it all in terms of trying to put "everything you need to know about NYC" in one easily accessible resource, but this is the best by far... And, it's FREE!! "
- Trurogirl

"I'm very impressed with what you have produced. It blows my mind that you created this in just 40 days. Thanks for your time. I hope you win the contest. "
- Isiah Johnson

"Everyone in NYC needs this. It's incredible how many useful features this single app has. "
- mcrobot

60+ NYC APPS IN ONE PACKAGE! 

* Street Eats (NYC Street vendors)
* Live Traffic Cams
* Wifi hotspot locations
* Dining and reservation with Open Table
* Many categories of Nightlife
* Shopping
* Art galleries
* Local Events
* Beauty and spa
* Apartment listings
* For sale listings
* Local jobs
* Tours and bookings
* Hotels
* Parking
* Restaurant Inspection Results
* Major Tourist Attractions
* FREE NYC - Things to do for FREE
* Coffee shops
* 24 hour pharmacies
* Wanted Criminals in NYC
* Average Emergency response times
* Safety Tips
* Emergency Help Lines
* Waste Disposal Sites
* Garbage collection schedule
* Emergency Rooms
* Police stations 
* Famous Eateries
* Green NYC
* Post office locations
* NYC News
* Subway Alerts
* Subway station locations
* NYC Events
* NYC Reporter
* Can I park here?
* Swine flu vaccination clinics
* NYC Parking sign legend
* NYC Alternate parking
* Weekday and Weekend Traffic updates
* Zipcar Locations
* 311 service requests
* Gadget Stores
* Volunteer Opportunities in NYC
* Ice skating
* Recreation Centers
* Zoos and Aquariums
* Parks
* Museums
* Nature care centers
* Bowling
* Yoga
* PATH Train Alerts
* Hiking Trails
* Swimming Pools
* Cultural Centers
* Libraries

Check-in from the app using facebook and Twitter.

Get the application that does it all for FREE, and find your WAY with NYC Way.
